Monad Testnet Interaction ✨ If you missed out on Aster, then @DrakeExchange is the Perp DEX on monad that you should look out for. Guide: • Go to: https://drake.exchange/trade • Connect your monad wallet • Click on the "settings icon" at the top right corner to disable 1-click trading. • Navigate to "Trade" and click "Activate Trading" • Claim test tokens and deposit asset • Select a pair, enter amount and create market order. • Navigate to "Earn" and select a vault • Approve and deposit token to the vault.
